name: TowerClimb Jelly
description:
It's a draft of a platform game that mashup a 3d world with 2d characters. I want to keep developing this idea and release a full project some day.

There is no levels or goals at the moment, and the graphics will be upgraded in the future. it's just a showcase of the gameplay.

How to play:

-use arrows or WASD to move

-use x or space to jump

-use esc to reset

Tip: You can wall jump
